mapper.select: SELECT scode, name, price, img, info FROM productinfo
SELECT scode, name, price, img, info FROM productinfo WHERE rownum <= 8
SELECT pi.scode as scode, pi.name as name, pi.price as price, pi.img as img, pi.info as info FROM productinfo pi, codiset c WHERE pi.scode = c.scode AND c.settype = 0
SELECT pi.scode as scode, pi.name as name, pi.price as price, pi.img as img, pi.info as info FROM productinfo pi, codiset c WHERE pi.scode = c.scode AND c.settype = 0 AND rownum <= 10
SELECT scode, name, price, img, info FROM productinfo WHERE scode IN (SELECT pcode FROM codiset WHERE scode = #{scode} AND pcode != #{scode})
